title: Cassandra's Conflict
description: A house in Hampstead, Behind a facade of cultured respectability lies a world of decadent indulgence and dark eroticism. Cassandra's sheltered life is transformed when she is employed as governess to the Baron's children. He draws her into games where lust can feed on the erotic charge of submissionâ€”games where only he knows the rules, and where unusual pleasures can flourish.
author: Fredrica Alleyn
